attributes.action: Declare the UK EU Referendum result void following the Leave campaign's lies.
attributes.background: The Leave campaign's lies have condemned this country, especially the young, to a far less prosperous and more insecure future. Its basically a con. The Referendum should be declared void and held again, without campaigning, and with only independently verified facts to back up each side.

rejection.details:
Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/148559
